name: Travel Games for Dummies
overview: Travel Games For Dummies lets you enjoy three of your favorite games on the go: Solitaire, Sudoku and Crosswords. Engage in hundreds of challenging puzzles with multiple difficulty levels from basic to brain-twisting. How-to-mode allows users to learn the rules of the game through an interactive tutorial. Practice mode gives players the opportunity to practice at their own pace while getting hints through an interactive interface In Play Mode players can now take what they’ve learned and test their skills in authentic games 3 Games Included: Sudoku, Crosswords, and Solitaire Over 600 puzzles for continuous fun
